Source code for JumpScale.baselib.credis.CRedis

import credis
#see https://github.com/yihuang/credis
import time
from JumpScale import j
# import JumpScale.baselib.redis

from .CRedisQueue import CRedisQueue

#code https://github.com/yihuang/credis/blob/master/credis/base.pyx


class CRedisFactory:

[docs]
    """
    """

    def __init__(self):
        self.redis = {}
        self.redisq = {}

    def getRedisClient(self, ipaddr, port,timeout=None):

[docs]        key = "%s_%s" % (ipaddr, port)
        if not self.redis.has_key(key):
            self.redis[key] = CRedis(ipaddr, port,timeout=timeout)
        return self.redis[key]

    def getRedisQueue(self, ipaddr, port, name, namespace="queues"):


[docs]        key = "%s_%s_%s_%s" % (ipaddr, port, name, namespace)
        if not self.redisq.has_key(key):
            self.redisq[key] = CRedisQueue(self.getRedisClient(ipaddr, port), name, namespace=namespace)
        return self.redisq[key]


class CRedis():


[docs]    """
    example for pipeline
     self.execute_pipeline(('SET',"test","This Should Return"),('GET',"test"))
    """

    def __init__(self, addr="127.0.0.1",port=7768,timeout=None):
        self.port=port
        self.redis=credis.Connection(host=addr,port=port,socket_timeout=timeout)
        self.connect()    
        self.fallbackredis=None

    def getFallBackRedis(self):        

[docs]        self.fallbackredis=j.clients.redis.getRedisClient(addr,port)
        #certain commands (which are not performance sensitive need normal pyredis)

    def connect(self):


[docs]        #return 100 times, max 10 sec
        for i in range(100):
            try:
                return self.redis.connect()
            except BaseException,e:
                if str(e).find("Connection refused")<>-1:
                    print "redis not available"
                    time.sleep(0.1)
                    continue
                eco=j.errorconditionhandler.parsePythonErrorObject(e)
                j.errorconditionhandler.raiseOperationalCritical(message='redis is down on port %s'%self.port, category='redis.down', msgpub='', die=True, tags='', eco=eco, extra=None)                

    def execute(self,*args):


[docs]        #return 100 times, max 10 sec
        for i in range(100):
            try:
                return self.redis.execute(*args)
            except Exception,e:
                if str(e).find("Socket closed on remote end")<>-1:
                    print "redis socket closed, retry"
                    time.sleep(0.1)
                    continue
                if str(e).find("Connection refused")<>-1:
                    self.connect()
                    time.sleep(1)
                    continue

                eco=j.errorconditionhandler.parsePythonErrorObject(e)
                j.errorconditionhandler.raiseOperationalCritical(message='redis is down on port %s'%self.port, category='redis.down', msgpub='', die=True, tags='', eco=eco, extra=None)                

    def llen(self,key):


[docs]        return self.execute('LLEN',key)

    def rpush(self,key, item):


[docs]        return self.execute('RPUSH',key,item)

[docs]        return self.execute('BLPOP',key,0)

[docs]        return self.execute('LPOP',key)

[docs]        return self.execute('KEYS',key)

    def hkeys(self,key):


[docs]        return self.execute('HKEYS',key)

    def exists(self,key):


[docs]        return self.execute('EXISTS',key)==1

[docs]        return self.execute('GET',key)

    def set(self,key,value):


[docs]        return self.execute('SET',key,value)

[docs]        return self.execute('HSET',hkey,key,value)

[docs]        return self.execute('HGET',hkey,key)

[docs]        return self.execute('HDEL',hkey,key)

[docs]        return self.execute('HDEL', name, *keys)

    def hexists(self,hkey,key):


[docs]        return self.execute('HEXISTS',hkey,key)==1

[docs]        return self.execute('INCR',key)

[docs]        return self.execute('BRPOPLPUSH', src, dst, timeout)

        return self.fallbackredis.script_load(script)
        # return self.execute('SCRIPTLOAD',script)
